[4] (4)Our consolidated liabilities at December 31, 2016 and 2015, include the following VIE liabilities for which the VIE creditors do not have recourse to Wells Fargo: Derivative liabilities, $33 million and $47 million; Accrued expenses and other liabilities, $107 million and $10 million; Long-term debt, $3.7 billion and $1.3 billion; and Total liabilities, $3.8 billion and $1.4 billion, respectively.
